tasks.label: clean
command: cd ~/projects/uros_ws/ && rm -rf build/ install/ log/ firmware/ && unset AMENT_PREFIX_PATH && unset CMAKE_PREFIX_PATH

tasks.label: create_firmware_ws
command: source ~/howto.ros2 && source ./install/local_setup.bash && cd ~/projects/uros_ws/ && ros2 run micro_ros_setup create_firmware_ws.sh freertos esp32

tasks.label: configure_firmware
command: source ~/howto.ros2 && source ./install/local_setup.bash && cd ~/projects/uros_ws/ && ros2 run micro_ros_setup configure_firmware.sh my_uros_app -t udp -i 192.168.1.177 -p 9999

tasks.label: menuconfig
command: source ~/howto.ros2 && source ./install/local_setup.bash && cd ~/projects/uros_ws/ && ros2 run micro_ros_setup build_firmware.sh menuconfig

tasks.label: build_firmware
command: source ~/howto.ros2 && source ./install/local_setup.bash && cd ~/projects/uros_ws/ && ros2 run micro_ros_setup build_firmware.sh

tasks.label: flash_firmware
command: source ~/howto.ros2 && source ./install/local_setup.bash && cd ~/projects/uros_ws/ && ros2 run micro_ros_setup flash_firmware.sh

tasks.label: build_agent
command: source ~/howto.ros2 && source ./install/local_setup.bash && cd ~/projects/uros_ws/ && ros2 run micro_ros_setup create_agent_ws.sh && ros2 run micro_ros_setup build_agent.sh
